title: Dark Star
body:
So the main entities in Dark Star are the Void, Darkin and Shadow Isles. Lets make this official. Sure j4 and Orianna are there but they are the worst of those skins. Here are suggestions for 2019 Dark Star Skins.


Dark Star Aatrox (purple with some cosmic red to match DS Rhaast)

Dark Star Mordekaiser (along with his VGU)

Dark Star Kog'Maw
 any other ideas?

replies.body:
https://cdnb.artstation.com/p/assets/images/images/004/443/271/large/slown-damn-darkstarxerath.jpg

As the embodiment of the actual Dark Star.
Dark Star Kayn {{champion:141}} and Dark Star Fiddlesticks {{champion:9}} are musts. Those skins would rock.

> [{quoted}](name=SciFi Scrivener,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=4sozPwUA,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2019-03-26T17:13:13.561+0000)
>
> Dark Star Kayn {{champion:141}} and Dark Star Fiddlesticks {{champion:9}} are musts. Those skins would rock.

Odyssey Kayn has Dark Star theming already with Rhaast.

it only has it for rhaast not  assassin kayn so kayn needs one
 so RIOT should make a new skin called dark star kayn  for both the kayns not just rhaast
Dark Star Malzahar seems like it'd be pretty cool. Like an event horizon / singularity ult.

Two big ones I think would fit that aren't Darkin, Void, or Shadow isles.

Dark Star {{champion:6}} having a black hole at the center of his stomach, pulling champions in to get eviscerated by the power of the dark star with every successful ult.

Dark Star {{champion:26}} having black hole bombs he can use. It'd fit the dark star aesthetic in the same way {{champion:61}} does IMO, and I do like that particular skin.
urgot sounds cool. but ZIlean is way outdated. These new skins should probably stick to more modern/updated champs where the skin would look good with the animations etc.

Dark Star Vel'Koz

Dark Star Hecarim

That's all I can think of off the top of my head

can we have a dark star kayn skin as kayn only has 2 skins and
as you said  it will be good with the aatrox skin aswell.
pls

soul hunter kayn skin was not that great as blue kayn in soul hunter kayn skin was like a wizard not an assassin. 

and odessy kayn's appearance  looked like both kayns were rhaast 
i personlly think after using that skin a bunch of time and beacuse of that i started using the standard skin 

so pls can you make a good skin for kayn like dark star or project kayn 

and these skins would be amazing and so cool
Wasn't There already some post about Dark Star Xerath?  Could Someone witth more time than me please be a sweetheart and link it? Pls & thx.

Idk but here is a cool picture of his potential abilities:
https://scontent-ort2-1.cdninstagram.com/vp/18bdab380065efb8c108ee59e8945255/5D4DCC9F/t51.2885-15/e35/20590197_1842130092771384_2398661362763956224_n.jpg?_nc_ht=scontent-ort2-1.cdninstagram.com
I think the particles look pretty sweet, but the skin itself could use improvements. Turning into the dark star with R is also pretty genius.

I definitely think Dark Star {{champion:161}} could be good. Been awhile since he got a "real" skin, he is being played pretty actively, in a good spot(Vel'Koz main speaking), and it could definitely fit thematically. As long as they focus on making the particles unique and far from his base skin's then it'd be pretty sweet. Right now Arclight is Vel's best skin, and in my opinion adding another skin could really give a lot of sales. I'd buy it straight out. Of course, I'd also buy a chroma for Arclight if they had some. Seeing Vel'Koz split a star in half or whatever his Q would be... man I'd love to see that.
Overall it makes sense.

Doesn't have a lot of skins already = CHECK
In a good spot = CHECK
Played rather often = CHECK
Fits the champion's design = CHECK

Personally Kog'Maw already has a lot of skins, and even has his Gemstone exclusive skin, so he can wait a bit.

Alternatively Rek'Sai ALSO is int he same boat, but has waiting MUCH longer for a new skin. Only having 1 new skin since release, which now only Neeko and Sylas have less skins than Rek'Sai but will probably surpass Rek'Sai in the near future.
